QuestData.Title: Blackhand's Crucible: Blackhand
QuestData.Description: Grommash Hellscream relied on the strength of his Warlords to keep the Iron Horde under his control. It is time to strike a decisive blow.$b$bBlackhand, Warlord of the Blackrock clan, is a dauntless warrior and ruthless tyrant. He is second only to Grommash within the Iron Horde and oversees operations in the Foundry from atop its Crucible.$b$bTravel to the Blackrock Foundry and defeat Blackhand.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Blackhand in the Blackrock Foundry.
